hero.title: Generative AI for Youth Mental Wellness
hero.subtitle: Empowering youth with AI-driven mental wellness support
hero.description: Join our supportive community and access AI-powered tools designed specifically for youth mental health and wellbeing.

gaming.title: AI-Powered Gaming
gaming.subtitle: Interactive games designed to improve mental health through engaging gameplay
gaming.mindful_breathing_quest_desc: Guide your character through peaceful landscapes using breathing techniques
gaming.cognitive_reframing_desc: Challenge negative thoughts and find positive perspectives.
gaming.mindful_maze_desc: Navigate a maze using mindfulness and focus.
gaming.pattern_painter_desc: Create beautiful patterns while practicing mindfulness.

emotionmonitoring.title: AI Emotion Monitoring
emotionmonitoring.subtitle: Real-time analysis of your emotional state using facial recognition and voice analysis
emotionmonitoring.stable_message: Your emotional state appears stable and positive. Keep up the good work!
emotionmonitoring.breathing_recommendation: Consider practicing deep breathing exercises to maintain this positive state.

peersupport.title: Peer Support Groups
peersupport.subtitle: Connect with others who understand your journey
peersupport.join_prompt: Would you like to engage with our supportive community?
peersupport.username_description: Choose a username to use in the support groups. You can be anonymous.
peersupport.welcome_message: Welcome, {username}! Connect with others who understand your journey.
peersupport.share_thoughts: Share your thoughts with the group...
peersupport.create_group_description: Fill in the details below to create a new space for connection.
peersupport.group_description_placeholder: A short description of your group's purpose.
peersupport.group1_desc: Support for college students and young professionals

messages.sarah_message: Just wanted to share that I had a breakthrough in therapy today! The breathing exercises we discussed really helped.
messages.alex_message: Having a tough day but remembering that it's okay to not be okay. Thanks for all the support yesterday!
messages.jordan_message: Does anyone have tips for managing social anxiety at work? Starting a new job next week.

session_guidelines.title: Session Guidelines
session_guidelines.guideline_1: Ensure you are in a quiet and private space.
session_guidelines.guideline_2: Check your internet connection for stability.
session_guidelines.guideline_3: Use headphones for better audio quality.
session_guidelines.guideline_4: Be respectful and mindful of the session time.
